citeinfo.origin: Alaska Department of Fish and Game (ADF&G), Division of Commercial Fisheries, Management and Development Division
citeinfo.title: Coded Wire Tag Database - Salmon

descript.abstract: Data Type: Fish ; This database is used to evaluate hatchery practices and estimate hatchery contributions. It is used for in-season fisheries management and a variety of research and restoration activities. Fish are tracked from release to return. The database is part of the Pacific States Marine Fisheries Commission coast wide database used to monitor salmonoid fish and steelhead as part of the US-Canada fisheries treaty.

idinfo.accconst: Non-restricted data is available upon request at a cost dependent on the complexity and quantity of the data requested.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
